ygData.subject: [archive-crawler] how to  Heritrix 3 recrawl failure crawlUrl
ygData.msgSnippet: I used mysql to store the failure crawUrl, I want to recrawl failure crawlUrl when the heritrix restart, so I wrote the IteratorSeedModule to select all

--=====003_Dragon458588323287_=====
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="gb2312"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I used mysql to store the failure crawUrl,
I want to recrawl failure crawlUrl when the heritrix restart, so I wrote the IteratorSeedModule to select all failure crawl urls, and publish them to frontier.
but a exception occured


Exception in thread " launchthread" java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.archive.modules.CrawlURI.getPolicyBasisUURI(CrawlURI.java:1774)
at org.archive.crawler.spring.SheetOverlaysManager.applyOverlays(SheetOverlaysManager.java:176)
at org.archive.crawler.spring.SheetOverlaysManager.applyOverridesTo(SheetOverlaysManager.java:333)
at org.archive.crawler.frontier.AbstractFrontier.schedule(AbstractFrontier.java:566)
at org.archive.crawler.frontier.AbstractFrontier.addedSeed(AbstractFrontier.java:830)
at org.archive.modules.seeds.SeedModule.publishAddedSeed(SeedModule.java:60)
at org.archive.modules.seeds.IteratorSeedModule.seedLine(IteratorSeedModule.java:82)
at org.archive.modules.seeds.TextSeedModule.announceSeedsFromReader(TextSeedModule.java:107)
at org.archive.modules.seeds.TextSeedModule.announceSeeds(TextSeedModule.java:83)
at org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.requestCrawlStart(CrawlController.java:343)
at org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlJob$1.run(CrawlJob.java:410)


package org.archive.modules.seeds;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.regex.Matcher;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException;
import org.archive.modules.CrawlURI;
import org.archive.modules.SchedulingConstants;
import org.archive.net.UURI;
import org.archive.net.UURIFactory;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import com.spider.service.SpiderUrlService;
import com.spider.service.SpiderUrls;
public class IteratorSeedModule extends TextSeedModule {
    /**
     * 
     */
    private static final long serialVersionUID = 8014122166026587657L;
    @Autowired
    private SpiderUrlService spiderUrlService;
    
    @Override
    protected void seedLine(String uri) {
 
            super.seedLine(uri);
       
        
        List<SpiderUrls> spiderUrlList =  spiderUrlService.getFailureList();
        
        for(int i=0; i <spiderUrlList.size(); i++) {
            SpiderUrls spiderUrls = spiderUrlList.get(i);
            
            try {
                UURI uuri = UURIFactory.getInstance(spiderUrls.getPageUrl());
                CrawlURI curi = new CrawlURI(uuri);
                curi.setSeed(false);
                curi.setBaseURI(spiderUrls.getBaseUrl());
                
                curi.setSchedulingDirective(SchedulingConstants.MEDIUM);
                publishAddedSeed(curi);
            } catch (URIException e) {

            }
            
            
        }
    
    }
}
